DOC.brief_summary: Assessing effect three oral care regimen plaque , gingivitis , tooth whitening : A randomized , person-centric , comparative effectiveness clinical research study Practitioners Engaged Applied Research Learning ( PEARL ) Network .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Effects Three Oral Care Regimens
DOC.detailed_description: Six month , five visit study plaque , gingivitis , tooth whiten three randomize intervention group use FDA market approve product device . One hundred fifty ( 150 ) subject patient base 10 PEARL Network associate dental office East Coast United States enter clinical research study . This post-marketing comparative effectiveness research study . Having total 5 visit six month period . Adverse event side effect product use assess .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Subject male females 18 70 year old ( inclusive ) . 2 . Availability 6 month duration clinical research study 3 . Good general health 4 . Subject able willing follow study procedure instruction 5 . Subject read , understood sign informed consent form 6 . Subject present least 20 natural teeth functional dentition ( exclude third molar ) , include follow natural ( uncrowned ) teeth shade : # 6 , # 7 , # 8 , # 9 , # 10 , # 11 Exclusion Criteria Potential subject must NOT HAVE ANY follow condition : 1 . Presence orthodontic band 2 . Presence partial removable denture 3 . Tumor ( ) soft hard tissue oral cavity 4 . Restorations crown would interfere color measurement follow teeth : # 6 , # 7 , # 8 , # 9 , # 10 & # 11 ( upper six front teeth ) 5 . Advanced periodontal disease ( purulent exudate , tooth mobility , and/or extensive loss periodontal attachment alveolar bone ) 6 . Five carious lesion require immediate restorative treatment 7 . Antibiotic use time one month prior entry study 8 . Participation clinical study test panel within one month prior entry study 9 . History allergy oral care/personal care consumer product ingredient . 10 . On prescription medicine might interfere study outcome 11 . An exist medical condition prohibits eat drinking period 4 hour 12 . History alcohol drug abuse 13 . Pregnant lactating
